CatDescriptText: W. Murphy, maintenance man, Webster Avenue, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column, published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 10, 1962, pg. 11 with question: "Do you think a shorter work week is the answer to the job loss posed by automation?" Answer reads: "I think the shorter work week is the answer."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of W. Murphy wearing wool hat, light colored sweater, and plaid coat, standing in front of building
